definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: blessing (Ar. barakah;un; Eth. barakat: Aram. [[בִּרְכָּא]] burkto0; NH as Heb.)—´[[ב]] Ge 12:2 + 39 t.; cstr. [[בִּרְכַּת]] Ge 28:4 + 9 t.; sf. [[בִּרְכָתוֹ]] Ge 49:28 + 7 t.; pl. [[בְּרָכוֹת]] Ps 21:7 + 4 t.; cstr. [[בִּרְכוֹת]], [[בִּרְכׂת]] Ge 49:25 + 5 t.; sf. [[בִּרְכוֹתֵיכֶם]] Mal 2:2; —

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of parent Ge 27:12, Ge 27:41, Ge 49:28 (JE), of Moses De 33:1.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of God Ex 32:29 (E) LV Ex 25:21 (P) De 11:26, De 11:27, De 11:29, De 23:6 (= Ne 13:2) De 28:2, De 28:8, De 30:1, De 30:19, Jos 8:34 (D) 2Sa 7:29, Ps 3:9, Ps 21:4, Ps 133:3, Is 44:3, Ez Eze 34:26, Eze 44:30, Joe 2:14, Mal 3:10; [[ברכת יהוה]] Ge 39:5 (J) De 12:15, De 16:17, De 33:23, Ps 129:8, Pr 10:22; ´[[ברכה מאת י]] Ps 24:5; [[ברכת אברהם]] Ge 28:4 (P), the blessing given to Abraham.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of the people, in recognition of good men Ps 109:17, Pr 10:6, Pr 11:26, Pr 24:25, Pr 28:20.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of a poor man, in recognition of benefits Job 29:13.
source of blessing: Abraham Ge 12:2 (J); Israel Is 19:24, Ez Eze 34:26, Zec 8:13; seed of the righteous Ps 37:26; the king Ps 21:7; memory of the righteous Pr 10:7; new wine Is 65:8.

blessing, prosperity: [[בברכת ישׁרים]] by the prosperity of the upright (the city is exalted) Pr 11:11; [[גם ברכות יעטה]] [[מורה]] yea, the early rain covereth with blessings Ps 84:7 cf. Ge 49:25, Ge 49:26; [[וארותי את ברכותיכם]] and I will curse your prosperity Mal 2:2.
a gift, present Ge 33:11 (E) Jos 15:19 (J) Ju Jdg 1:15, 1Sa 25:27, 1Sa 30:26, 2Ki 5:15; [[נֶפֶשׁ בְּרָכָה]] a liberal person Pr 11:25 (cf. Syr. buwrko0, Eth. barakat:).
